channel.title: Updates from Andrea Censi's website
channel.description: Site updates from my website and blog.

item.title: Draft: Bootstrapping, uncertain semantics, and invariance
item.description: Some recent work: Bootstrapping, uncertain semantics, and invariance (PDF) . Comment from a reader: "whoa... quite... esoteric...".
item.content:encoded: Some recent work: Bootstrapping, uncertain semantics, and invariance (PDF) . Comment from a reader: "whoa... quite... esoteric...".

item.title: Draft: A group-theoretic approach to formalizing bootstrapping problems
item.description: Some recent work: A group-theoretic approach to formalizing bootstrapping problems (PDF) . See also the supplemental videos page .
item.content:encoded: Some recent work: A group-theoretic approach to formalizing bootstrapping problems (PDF) . See also the supplemental videos page .

item.title: Site update
item.description: Added links to slides for most of the papers in the publications page.
item.content:encoded: Added links to slides for most of the papers in the publications page.

item.title: New video about fly research
item.description: Here's a cool video which shows the simulated visual input of a free-flying Drosophila Melanogaster.
item.content:encoded: Here's a cool video which shows the simulated visual input of a free-flying Drosophila Melanogaster.

item.title: Finally updating all these outdated webpages.
item.description:
Updated pages:

  • my publications list
  • Research interests and recent highlights
  • List of recent software projects
  • Favorite quotes
item.content:encoded:
Updated pages:

  • Research interests and recent highlights
  • List of recent software projects

item.title: PyContracts, a new Python project
item.description: A recent project: PyContracts , a Python package that allows to declare constraints on function parameters and return values. It supports a basic type system, variables binding, arithmetic constraints, and has several specialized contracts (notably for Numpy arrays).
item.content:encoded: A recent project: PyContracts , a Python package that allows to declare constraints on function parameters and return values. It supports a basic type system, variables binding, arithmetic constraints, and has several specialized contracts (notably for Numpy arrays).

item.title: TAing the advanced robotics course
item.description: I'm TAing ME132a-b, "Advanced Robotics: Navigation and vision" , which this year is taught by the Computer Vision Group at Nasa JPL .
item.content:encoded: I'm TAing ME132a-b, "Advanced Robotics: Navigation and vision" , which this year is taught by the Computer Vision Group at Nasa JPL .

item.title: A new website and a ROS wrapper for CSM.
item.description:
CSM moved to Github .

Also, Ivan Dryanovski created a ROS wrapper .
item.content:encoded:
CSM moved to Github .

Also, Ivan Dryanovski created a ROS wrapper .
